remarks: Associative-type law for group subtraction and addition.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
ablsubadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
ablsubadd.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
abladdsub $p |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .+ Y ) .- Z ) = ( ( X .- Z ) .+ Y ) ) $.
